Got it! Thanks for submitting.

You'll recieve an email with a copy/confirmation of your picks, or you can see all the picks here (this sheet updates every 5 minutes, be patient).

If you have any feedback, suggestions, or improvement requests for officefootball.club, please let me know and I will do my very best to keep making it better throughout the season!

Thanks,
